survey_name: Wearable Fitness Technology User Experience Survey
survey_brief: Evaluate user satisfaction, feature utilization, and challenges faced with wearable fitness devices to inform product improvements.

questions.question_text: Do you currently own or regularly use a wearable fitness device (e.g., smartwatch, fitness tracker)?
questions.client_notes: Use as a screening question. Consider adding 'Prefer not to answer' if anonymity is critical.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with vertical layout. Mandatory response.

script.question_text: Do you currently own or regularly use a wearable fitness device (e.g., smartwatch, fitness tracker)?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary wearable fitness device?
questions.client_notes: Use standard 5-point Likert scale. Randomize scale direction for 10% of respondents to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with horizontal layout. Require answer unless 'Prefer not to answer' is added.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary wearable fitness device?

questions.question_text: Which features do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Limit to 7 core features. Include 'Other' option if comprehensive data is needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkboxes with vertical layout. Add 'Select all that apply' instruction.

script.question_text: Which features do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you experienced? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Monitor for frequent pain points. Consider follow-up qualitative research on top selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkboxes with 'Other' text field. Randomize option order for 30% of respondents.

script.question_text: What challenges have you experienced? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How important is waterproofing in your device selection?
questions.client_notes: Assess feature prioritization. Compare with actual usage data for validation.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with visual scale (stars or emojis optional).

script.question_text: How important is waterproofing in your device selection?

questions.question_text: How often do you sync your device with other health/fitness apps?
questions.client_notes: Identify integration patterns. Consider cross-promotion opportunities with popular apps.
questions.scripter_notes: Dropdown menu to save space on mobile devices.

script.question_text: How often do you sync your device with other health/fitness apps?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your device to others?
questions.client_notes: Track Net Promoter Score (NPS). Follow up with low scores in later stages.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with NPS color coding (green to red).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your device to others?

questions.question_text: What additional health metrics would you like to see tracked?
questions.client_notes: Identify R&D opportunities. Allow multiple selections but limit to 6 options.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkboxes with 'Other' field. Grid layout for desktop users.

script.question_text: What additional health metrics would you like to see tracked?

questions.question_text: What price range would you consider for your next wearable device?
questions.client_notes: Assess price sensitivity. Compare with current market positioning.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with currency symbols. Localize for different regions.

questions.client_notes: Use text analysis tools for sentiment evaluation. Limit to 500 characters.
